messages.messageBody:
Hi This is Sherry passing this product story on to you. I'm enjoying
the Moistursil as well. I have chronic contact dermatitis on my hands
and the Moistursil is bringing back the moisture to my hands.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject: Eczema Success Story with Moistursil!!!
Date: Thu, 10 Aug 2000 07:28:34 -0500
From: Fred Poneman <poneman@...>
To: debrap@...

Success stories with our new products are already pouring in...

OUR NEW PRODUCT MOISTURSIL PROBLEM SKIN LOTION SPECIFICALLY FORMULATED
TO
GET RID OF STUBBORN ECZEMA, PSORIASIS, DERMATITIS AND CHRONIC DRY SKIN
NOT
ONLY CONTAINS T-36 MELALEUCA OIL BUT ALLONTOIN. ALLONTOIN IS A NATURAL
INGREDIENT THAT 1)PROVIDES PENETRATING RELIEF BY PULLING MOISTURE DEEP
INTO
THE SKIN, 2)FORMS A PROTECTIVE SEAL ON THE SURFACE, AND 3)HAS BEEN
PROVEN
TO STIMULATE THE FORMATION OF HEALTHY SKIN TISSUE...

"I have had eczema on and off since I was a teenager. Mine seems to be
triggered by stress and in college I had it around my eyes so bad that
they
would swell shut. There were a lot of times where I couldn't wear
contacts
and I have never been able to wear eye makeup without a lot if
irritation.
(By the way, I can wear NICOLE MILLER and for the last year have even
been
wearing mascara and eye liner without any allergic reactions!)

While the eczema on my face, hands, and arms would come and go I could
never get rid of a patch of it on my neck and it has been there for
almost
10 years! (I am 32.) Before going to Convention 2000 I swam in the ocean
twice
and couldn't stay in very long because the eczema on my neck stung so
badly.

While strolling through the product store at Convention I put some
Moistursil on my eczema and it immediately felt better and smoother. I
went
and bought products and they forgot to put the Moistursil in my bag. I
didn't get to use it again that day but even after going to the pool and
showering it still felt better the next day. I brought my receipt back
and
they gave me the Moistursil no questions asked. By Sunday the eczema on
my
neck was COMPLETELY GONE.

I've now been home from Convention for a few days and I can't believe
how
this
one little product has made me feel better, look better, and has really
changed my life. My passion is scuba diving and now
I can enjoy it without pain and discomfort.

We have the power to change other peoples lives in so many positive ways
just by sharing from our heart what Melaleuca means to us. Don't let
anyone or anything keep you from enhancing other people's lives and
reaching
your goals, No Matter What!

Michele Hendrickson
Director III, Iowa
